title: Competitive:E-liter 3K
paragraphs: The E-liter has a slow charge paired with a long range and deadly percussion. A popular strategy for charger users is to perch at high points, and pick off opponents while their teammates ink the stage. E-liter 3K users can utilize Burst Bombs to force opponents out of ink and track them with Echolocator.

- 1 Splatoon

1.2 Synergy
1.3 Countermeasures
1.4 Gear abilities
